text: <#C8RQUU2KH|makie> has its own channel. But you can probably use the `arrows` call. The positions argument takes a vector the origins, in your case `[Point3f0(0,0,0)]` and the directions takes a vector of the displacement vectors `[Vec3f0(0,0,1)]`. The syntax might not be exactly this.
